elements.name: Verify progress overview page with a student has not finished all materials and quizzes yet

steps.name: User has opened the browser
The user is on the application login page
User enters username "pengajar1@example.com" and password "pengajar1"
User clicks on the login button
User clicks on Pemantauan
User clicks on "Progres" button of "Komputer Grafik" course
Student tasks finish status should be set like these:
Student progress of "Komputer Grafik" course should be set like these:
The page title should be "Pemantau Progres Belajar"
The page subtitle should be the same with "Komputer Grafik" course
The study progress of every student should be displayed

elements.name: Verify ascending sorting operation on Riwayat Kuis page

steps.name: User has opened the browser
The user is on the application login page
User enters username "pengajar1@example.com" and password "pengajar1"
User clicks on the login button
User clicks on Pemantauan
User clicks on "Detail Kuis" button of "Komputer Grafik" course
User clicks on Lihat Hasil button of Tes Progres quiz
The quiz results for "Tes Progres Komgraf" in course "Komputer Grafik" are set as follows:
User clicks on "ascending" sorting button
The displayed names should be sorted in "ascending" order

elements.name: Verify descending sorting operation on Riwayat Kuis page

steps.name: User has opened the browser
The user is on the application login page
User enters username "pengajar1@example.com" and password "pengajar1"
User clicks on the login button
User clicks on Pemantauan
User clicks on "Detail Kuis" button of "Komputer Grafik" course
User clicks on Lihat Hasil button of Tes Progres quiz
The quiz results for "Tes Progres Komgraf" in course "Komputer Grafik" are set as follows:
User clicks on "descending" sorting button
The displayed names should be sorted in "descending" order

elements.name: Verify descending sorting operation on Pemantau Progres Belajar page

steps.name: User has opened the browser
The user is on the application login page
User enters username "pengajar1@example.com" and password "pengajar1"
User clicks on the login button
User clicks on Pemantauan
User clicks on "Progres" button of "Komputer Grafik" course
User clicks on "descending" sorting button
The displayed names on Pemantau Progres Belajar page should be sorted in descending order
